name: TeleTrainer02
0:
”Alexa open My Tele Buddy”
”Alexa start My Tele Buddy”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my tele buddy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is intended as a proof of concept for delivery of fitness program to older people over a smart speaker with display (Amazon Echo Show 5 or Echo Show 8). The skill will offer an exercise and a dietary support. The purpose of the project is to develop a virtual personal trainer that would guide daily sessions after a qualified professional would have created a workout program based on individual goals, whether it be strength, flexibility, balance or general fitness. Participation in the trial is currently by invitation only. For additional inquiries, contact us by email: office@livevr.com.au
or phone: (+61) 0403238585
Disclaimer: "The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
